trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Oak Forest
There were no other sightings in Oak Forest on or around February 12th 2002
Summary: unidentified flying object hovering over home
divs: Sighting DetailsPhelicopter appearing aircraft circlingresidential area very low. my daughter called to me and said, come see this. ithink its military or something. i was shocked at how low it was. it circledonce, swooped down, and came at us flying even lower. it was like a dark green,may be blackish. it hovered over my neighbors house and appeared wobbly. wethought it was having mechanical problems and might fall on us. it justhovered. finally it began to move and we were happy! but it moved slowly andpassed right over our heads. it then stopped and hovered right above our homesdriveway, almost directly above my head. i shouted for my daughters to get inthe house. i followed and called the police. they knew nothing about it. iran back outside with the phone in my hand and it had vanished. my daughter sawit head straight south very rapidly after we went inside. very strange.
